Text:
Holy? Dont make me laugh...

The main fact Allah believers want to hide SO DESPERATELY is all the stupid things they believe: that the sun every night sinks into a murky pond and that´s why lights go out (Quran), and then when trying to convert people lie that the Quran has true science in it, the existence of RELIGIOUS POLICE in countries where that religion rules, who indulge in all kind of abuse and arbitrary tortures, the only religion that punishes apostasy with DEATH, denying basic human freedom, etc., etc. So they lie and try to hide their religion´s basic stupidity and brutality with long texts on anything else, as if people could be so easily fooled... I don´t believe in any religion, but I find this one particularly backward and revolting.

I do not spread hate, just uncomfortable truths Allah believers want to hide so it does not spoil their pathetic attempts at converting people stupid enough to believe what they preach. If any potential convert finds out about the stupidity of quran as well as the religion police in such countries, that once you convert there is no going back or you might be killed, they would refuse to join such a brutal, primitive religion. I only try to warn people about what some want to hide from them, those who still want to convert and believe all that nonsense, they have a right to do so.

xalamanderx is a filthy crypto-jew liar that makes up his bullshit. He's talking about what hos scumbag ilk believe they are God's "chosen" people, meanwhile he's only half right, they were chosen by Satan.

When followers of Islam allow ALL other peoples and religions to have EQUAL say, THEN perhaps Islam can be taken seriously.

ah..is this in english?..
i am a hindu. i am an atheist. preaching religion shud be thot of as social service. and preach to those who need it. nt advertise the advantages and perks u ll get if u change religion. u r nt getting them to follow ur political party or a secret cult. we have lost more than a handful of greatly varying tribal traditions and practices that gives us an insight to hw we lived before we got "civilized". (an african tribesman named eric or peter).  the terrorists have been using islam as a shield for their own protection.. i am not against any religion but i detest preachers who r hell bent on brain washing men.

Ive lived 47 years of my 67 without believing in any gods and they have been happy years, without the fear and guilt religions put in peoples minds to trap them into such nonsense. In India they believe in elephant headed gods and other fantasies, muslims put their bottoms up five times a day to present to their bugger god withn the quran as the most nonsensical book ever written, fit only for ignorant bedawi and fellahs, sometimes I feel as an extraterrestrial being since I cant identify with humans who descend to such stupidity out of fear and ignorance. As if endelessly repeating mantras or suras or prayers will do them any REAL good...

I have believed in my God my whole life, i do not claim to be perfect and I do not judge you based on your belief. If you ask me about my God I will tell you but I will not make you listen to my rhetoric if you don't. I am not stupid out of fear and ignorance, no the fact is, I know how my God has worked in my life and know there is one. I wont argue my religion with you because you can have your opinion and I will have mine. 
Now on another note, there are some real nut jobs out there that believe some pretty screwed up things, IMO, and those the beliefs of this torrent are right up there near the top competing with mormons and whatever that crap is that believes in zen.

What you dont realize is that all who believe in religions, ANY religion, believe in INVISIBLE THINGS, they cant prove exist, that makes them stupid in a way since swindlers and con-men use the same trick to deceive and rip off gullible people. So although you may feel above those others who believe even crazier things than you, basically you are at their same level, whether you like it or not...
